flying.name: Flying
flying.description: Can move over water and obstacles but cannot end its turn on them.
flying.effect: Ignores terrain movement restrictions except for landing zones.

charge.name: Charge
charge.description: Can move two tiles in a straight line to initiate an attack.
charge.effect: Must move exactly 2 tiles in a straight line and attack the destination tile if occupied by an enemy.

fleet.name: Fleet
fleet.description: Can move multiple spaces per turn instead of one.
fleet.effect: May move 1..N tiles each turn (N default 2) but cannot attack after moving more than 1 space.

spaces.description: Maximum tiles this unit may move in a single turn.

sniper.name: Sniper
sniper.description: Can attack enemy units up to two tiles away in a straight line.
sniper.effect: May target a visible enemy unit within 2 tiles without moving.

fear.name: Fear
fear.description: Reduces the combat strength of adjacent enemies.
fear.effect: All enemy units adjacent to this unit are demoted 1 rank during combat.

trap_sense.name: Trap Sense
trap_sense.description: Can detect hidden traps or bombs nearby.
trap_sense.effect: Reveals any traps or hidden hazards within a 1-tile radius.

curse.name: Curse
curse.description: Afflicts enemies that defeat this unit.
curse.effect: The unit that defeats this is demoted 1 rank permanently.

veteran.name: Veteran
veteran.effect: When this unit defeats an enemy, it gets promoted one rank maximum.

highlander.name: Highlander
highlander.description: Fights with advantage on elevated terrain.
highlander.effect: Unit's rank is promoted when fighting from a mountain tile.

assassin.name: Assassin
assassin.description: Defeats the strongest enemy unit when attacking.
assassin.effect: When attacking the strongest enemy unit, this unit wins.
